title: Children in the hospital
creator_credit: Edward Mason, M D and International Film Bureau
brief_description: Describes through the experience of two young girls, the methods used in the pediatrics department of Boston City Hospital to alleviate the psychological burden of hospitalisation. Shows the varied reaction of the children and demonstrates the importance of adult assistance in reducing the pain and the disturbing consequences of hospitalisation.
